description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ag6g6","text":"This protocol explains the methodology to generate lipid nanotubes pulled from giant unilamellar vesicles for fluorescence microscopy experiments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: Generation of membrane tubules ,giant unilamellar vesicles

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fgpmd","text":"Mix DOPC, DOPS and Atto 647N DOPE at 59.9:40:0.1 mol% respectively in a final volume of   with chloroform and   lipid final concentration in a glass vial.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":88,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":110,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"9E085BF0013011EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"A10659B0013011EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1832}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"duubt","text":"Dry the lipid mixture in the glass vials for   in a vacuum chamber forming the dried lipid films on the bottom of the glass vials.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"B0596290013011EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5n509","text":"Add   of the lipid films hydration buffer A to the glass vial containing the dried lipid films.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7401d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"C14533E0013011EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ae36n","text":"Vortex the glass vials until visually seeing complete resuspension of the dried lipid films in the solution (seen by an increase in the turbidity of the lipid solution) forming the multilamellar vesicles (MLVs).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"as9i8","text":"Mix   of MLVs with   of silica beads in an Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dcurb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"CD59DAA0013011EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"D089BDD0013011EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"blp4k","text":"Deposit 6 drops of   each containing the mixture of MLVs and silica beads on a parafilm slide placed in the bottom of a petri dish.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"D82EFC80013011EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cnsuo","text":"Dry the drops for   in the vacuum chamber until the liquid is completely dried.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ci20m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"DF358A30013011EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"coc0k","text":"Take one dried drop from the parafilm and insert it into a small plastic tip cutted at the thin end containing   of   trehalose solution until visually seeing how the dried beads get to the thin bottom.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":111,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":116,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"02A7CA00013111EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"E72EB540013011EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2fmo","text":"Incubate the cutted plastic tip containing the drop and the trehalose for   at   attaching it to the cap of an Eppendorf with   destilled water inside by doing a small hole in the cap and inserting the cutted plastic tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":79,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":126,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fqqa4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"F002FE10013011EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F3B3D110013011EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"60","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"F7AA1180013011EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6live","text":"Passivate the microscopy chamber by adding   solution of   BSA for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":43,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"1C6F1010013111EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"20E83C20013111EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1832}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"30747D70013111EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8fa97","text":"Remove the cutted plastic tip from the Eppendorf and put the thin part of the cutted tip in contact with the microscopy chamber containing   of working buffer until visually seeing how the beads are transferred from the tip to the observation chamber.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":139,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dimsp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8hu0r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"4015CD60013111EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":45},{"key":1,"length":1,"offset":50}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":4,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"3imof","text":"Note: the microscopy chamber contains either   or   of GFP-LRRK2 in the solution.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"concentration":"20","error_concentration":false,"guid":"461EC130013111EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":30},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"concentration"},"1":{"data":{"concentration":"0.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"5AF31750013111EE9E0CE31D87904685","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"concentration"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"41ohu","text":"Gently stir the microscopy chamber to promote the detachment of the hydrated lipid films from the silica beads, leading to the formation of the GUVs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90glv","text":"Place a closed micropipette in the micro-positioning system (MP-285, Sutter Instrument, Novato, CA, USA), and use it to approach the pipette to the GUV membrane.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"kve4","text":"Touch the GUV membrane with the pipette and then move back the pipette until a lipid nanotube is pulled from the GUV.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"95lii","text":"Wait until protein coverage reaches the steady state in both the GUV and the pulled membrane nanotube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
